comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: In 1913, which appears to be the year in which most of these Bain photos were taken, Frank Tucker was appointed the chairman of a committee (in New York State) to investigate problems relating to the support and welfare of dependent widows and their dependent children. Here is Tucker's report, which was published in 1914: www.archive.org/stream/reportofinvestig00newyiala#page/n0...
